name: Jorji and Impossible Forest
description: Help little Jorji to survive in his journey to the depths of Impossible Forest, in this super-hard, hand-crafted 2D platformer.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i3 M380 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
